error.signature: Error: Missing Suspense boundary with useSearchParams

verdict.summary: useSearchParams() must be wrapped in a Suspense boundary for static rendering.

dead_ends.why_fails: Page is already a client component; the issue is the missing Suspense
router.query doesn't exist in App Router; it's a Pages Router API

workarounds.action: Wrap the component using useSearchParams in <Suspense>: <Suspense fallback={<Loading/>}><SearchComponent/></Suspense>
workarounds.how: Suspense boundary enables static rendering with dynamic client-side params

workarounds.action: Use searchParams page prop for server-side access
workarounds.how: export default function Page({ searchParams }) â€” available in Server Components
